name: Nextjs-sanity-boilerplate
description: This boilerplate is a monorepo setup containing both a **Next.js** frontend and a **FastAPI** backend, integrated with **Sanity CMS**. The frontend uses **TypeScript**, **Redux** for state management, **Tailwind CSS** (with light and dark mode), and **Next.js App Router** for routing.
author: Charity May Laurel
